titles.title: A resolution welcoming President Santiago Pena of Paraguay and commemorating the bilateral relationship between the Republic of Paraguay and the United States.
A resolution welcoming President Santiago Pena of Paraguay and commemorating the bilateral relationship between the Republic of Paraguay and the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution welcomes the visit of Paraguayan President Santiago Pena and celebrates the contributions that Paraguayans and Paraguayan-Americans have made in the United States. The resolution also commemorates 163 years of diplomatic relations between the United States and Paraguay and expresses support for working towards shared foreign policy priorities.
